name: Pinata Simulator
description:
Pinata simulator is a vr game about whacking some pinatas. 

You will be in field by a tree ready to hit some pinata, so grab your baseball bat and get ready to hit and destroy pinatas. There are two different modes that are available to you which is Free Attack and Time Attack.

Free Attack is where a pinata will spawn and it will explode if you hit the pinata enough times. Once it destroy it will spawn in a different location and it will keep doing this until you leave.

Time Attack is you have 20 seconds to hit the pinata as many times as you can and try and get a high hit count. You can try this mode as many times you want.

Built for Oculus GO and Oculus RIFT!

Credit:

Lead Designer: Bryn Jenkins

Programmer: Dillon Curry, Coby Jennings, Caleb Otto-Hayes

Audio: Justin Dando

Art Asset: Google Poly, Coby Jennings, Bryn Jenkins
